mapper.update: update role_info set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seq = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isdefault = #{isdefault,jdbcType=INTEGER}, crt_user = #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, crt_time = #{crtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lst_upd_user = #{lstUpdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lst_upd_time = #{lstUpdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lst_upd_date = #{lstUpdDate,jdbcType=DATE}, rec_status = #{recStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, scr_level = #{scrLevel,jdbcType=CHAR} where ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ROLE_ID, `name`, seq, description, isdefault, crt_user, crt_time, lst_upd_user, lst_upd_time, lst_upd_date, rec_status, scr_level from role_info where ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ROLE_ID, `name`, seq, description, isdefault, crt_user, crt_time, lst_upd_user, lst_upd_time, lst_upd_date, rec_status, scr_level from role_info
